description:
Suddenly losing a loved one is always difficult. From The Law Offices of Frederick W. Nessler and Associates, Ltd., in Lincoln, Illinois, we have represented many wrongful death claims throughout Chicago, Decatur and Champaign. We start with a free initial consultation, at which time we talk to you about your circumstances: what you have experienced, how you are feeling and how your family has been affected. Our attorneys act compassionately because we know how overwhelming your grief is.

 

A wrongful death case, whether it is due to a motor vehicle accident, medical negligence, nursing home neglect or dangerous product, may result in a variety of damages. For example, we understand that you may be suffering from a loss of financial support in addition to the emotional duress you are under. The attorneys at our law offices look at every angle of your case to develop a strategy that targets maximum compensation on your behalf.

 

Our practice is also able to assist you if you have personally suffered a catastrophic injury as the result of a drunk, uninsured or distracted driver, or if you have been a victim of institutional or clergy abuse. The Law Offices of Frederick W. Nessler and Associates, Ltd., has represented people in workers’ compensation cases that involve asbestos and mesothelioma as well.
